resources.string: <html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;"> CCNA course, in duration of 280 classes, represents the first part of Networking Academy programe. Course is fit for the exam for acquiring CCNA sertificate. Via course, students will learn to install and configure Cisco routers and switches in multiprotocol enviroment using LAN and WAN technologies. Material for CCNA course (curriculum) is shown through interactive multimedial form, and available to students via Internet. Arround 80% of the course deals with general network technologies and protocols, while the remaining 20% is related to Cisco equipment. CCNA course is divided on four semesters. </body> </html>
